Welcome to Aurora’s documentation!¶

Aurora is your smart home voice assistant of the future. It’s a network of nodes positioned around your house that listens to your voice commands and does whatever you program it to do. Aurora respects your privacy unlike other solutions such as Alexa.

    • Configuring a local node
    • Running the node
